properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 4:26AM PST until January 18 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 18
inches.

* WHERE...South Washington Cascades.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
properties.instruction:
Significant amounts of snow are forecast that will make travel
dangerous. Only travel in an emergency. If you must travel, keep
an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an
emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY
